product_name: Fat Tire Tales and Trails: Arizona Mountain Bike Trail Guide - 20th Edition
long_description: This revised, entertaining, hand-illustrated little guide will keep you laughing all the way to the best of the best Arizona trails! Author: Cosmic Ray. Softcover; 144 pages; black-and-white hand-drawn maps. Cosmic Ray; copyright 2007. Includes down-to-earth maps, summer and winter fun, gnarly glossary of bike lingo and steaming heaps of trail nuggets. Arizona Mountain Bike Yellow Page listings.
short_description: This revised, entertaining, hand-illustrated little guide will keep you laughing all the way to the best of the best Arizona trails!
